about_the_game:
Welcome to Good Soup, a deliciously terrifying indie horror game where your simple craving for soup takes a sinister turn. Inspired by the popular Itch.io game "Egg Fried Rice," Good Soup blends everyday mundanity with spine-chilling horror, delivering a uniquely unsettling experience that will leave you hungry for more.


In Good Soup, every choice you make can lead to different outcomes. Will you find the soup you're looking for, or will you become the next victim of the soup monster? With multiple endings to uncover, each playthrough offers a new flavor of terror. Your decisions matter—can you discover all the savory endings hidden within this pot of horrors?


Immerse yourself in the game's intense atmosphere, heightened by eerie sound design and unsettling visuals. As you navigate dark alleyways and abandoned streets, the tension builds with every step. The relentless pursuit by the soup monster will keep you on the edge of your seat, your heart pounding with each horrifying encounter. Good Soup serves up a perfect blend of fear and suspense, ensuring an unforgettable gaming experience.


The journey begins with a simple goal: find some soup to satisfy your hunger on your way home. However, what starts as an ordinary errand quickly spirals into a nightmarish adventure. As you explore the twisted world of Good Soup, you'll need to solve puzzles, uncover clues, and avoid the monstrous entity that lurks in the shadows. Will you succeed in finding the soup, or will you become part of the recipe for disaster?

Prepare yourself for a harrowing culinary quest in Good Soup. Can you survive the chase and satisfy your craving, or will the soup monster make you its next meal? Dive into this delectable nightmare and discover the terrifying secrets that lie within the bowl.

name: Good Soup

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: AMD / Intel CPU (AMD FX-4300 or Intel i3-4130 or newer)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD / NVIDIA dedicated graphics card, with at least 2GB of dedicated VRAM and Shader Model 5.1 support (AMD R9 285 and NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or newer)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated or dedicated DirectX 9 compatible soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD / Intel CPU (AMD Ryzen 3 1300x or Intel i7-930 or newer)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD / NVIDIA dedicated graphics card, with 6GB of dedicated VRAM and Shader Model 6.0/6.1 support (i.e. AMD RX 580 8GB and NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or newer)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated or dedicated DirectX 9 compatible soundcard

short_description: Good Soup is a spine-chilling indie horror game where your quest for a simple bowl of soup turns into a nightmarish adventure. Navigate dark alleys, solve puzzles, and evade a relentless soup monster. With multiple endings and intense atmosphere, can you survive this terrifying culinary quest?
